channel.title: Need help with compiler!
channel.description:
Hi i have a problem, i cannot run my (source) Run server :S it will say "The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue..."
- I am running on a JDK1.6.0.31 * yes i did change it but still didnt work for me :( *
thats what inside the run (edit) @echo off title MYSERVERNAME "C:/Program Files(x86)/Java/jdk1.6.0_25/bin/java" -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

item.title: Need help with compiler!
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

try

@echo off title MYSERVERNAME "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jdk1.6.0_31/bin/ java.exe" -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; .server pause

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with compiler!
item.dc:creator: @zond zond
item.description:
@zond wrote:

  • I am running on a JDK1.6.0.31 * yes i did change it but still didnt work for me
    Oh yeah?
    “C:/Program Files(x86)/Java/jdk1.6.0_25/bin/java”
    then why there is other version?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with compiler!

item.description:
@Demo1 wrote:

@echo off title MYSERVERNAME "C:/Program Files(x86)/Java/jdk1.6.0_31/bin/java" -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

^^I fixed the code. Try that.

item.title: Need help with compiler!
item.dc:creator: @pk-pown3r pk-pown3r
item.description:
@pk-pown3r wrote:

Hi i have a problem, i cannot run my (source) Run server :S
it will say “The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue…”

  • I am running on a JDK1.6.0.31 * yes i did change it but still didnt work for me *

thats what inside the run (edit)
@echo off
title MYSERVERNAME
“C:/Program Files(x86)/Java/jdk1.6.0_25/bin/java” -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause
